## Expected Behavior
Temporal converts completion of workflow into ContinueAsNew event if there is a cron
or retry policy attached to the execution.  This is confusing as workflow failure is not
reported as `workflow_failed` counter when it does ContinueAsNew due to retry or
cron policy on the execution.

## Actual Behavior
`workflow_failed` counter is emitted for workflows with cron or retry policy.
